title: Under the weather
body: Feeling better today, tested negative yesterday as well as I just got the results. Probably just spring allergies!

comments.body: That's great! I'm so glad you're doing well.
Very nice! Hope to see you soon!

title: Can get someone groceries if needed!
body: If anybody needs groceries, I can help! I'm a big fan of the grocery store at the corner of the street. I can get them for you!

comments.body: I'm available as well! I can help!

title: The rates have gone down recently
body: Looking at the current data and trends, it is safe to say our community is doing very well compared to neighboring counties.

title: I'm looking for a new job!
body: Looking for a new job, would love to hear about any opportunities!

comments.body: If you're looking for a new job, I can help!
